title: Looking for duo
body:
Hey all,
I am in bronze and just want another person to duo with in ranked. I play adc main but can play support and mid also.
Hit me up if you are keen, im easy going and wont troll.

replies.body: Hey I'm interested as well. Add me and we'll discuss this.
This intrigues me. I'd love to play with you. Add me and msg me back
